attributes.action: Put a stop to the Equalities Bill, discriminating against the white male population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Harriet Harman trying to push through the new Equalities Bill, which actively discriminates against white male workers, to favour the offering of jobs to female or ethnic workers. This is an unfair bill and should be stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
